main.name: Patrick Goulding
main.description: Software Engineer based in Seattle, WA
main.bio: When I'm not trying new recipes, hiking with my dog, or fiddling with IoT automation, I create beautiful and accessible websites. Specializing in JavaScript, React and Node. I'm always open to learning new things and interesting challenges.
main.contactmessage: Contact me by email for technical writing, conference talks, buisness ideas, or presentations. Not currently looking for full time employment.

education.description: Turing School of Software and Design is an immersive training in fundamental web technologies. Web development with JavaScript, React, Professional Client-Side development, desktop and mobile applications with web technologies.

education.school: Community College of the Air Force
education.description: The Electronics Systems Technology program teaches students to design and build electronic systems and learn about analog and digital electronics. They are able to apply the engineering and mathematical principles that they learn in order to implement and maintain electronic systems, such as computers and controllers.

work.title: DevOps Systems Engineer
work.description: Responsible for software deployment, automation scripting, device configuration, operations and maintenance of on-prem servers, registers, hardware, and operating systems. Led efforts to establish hybrid cloud CICD solution for Store Commerce. Supported selling and fullfilment teams to ensure business continuity via our Brick and Mortar platforms.

work.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Redesigned front and backend of legacy app built in Flash and PHP used for emergency school and 911 communications to utilize new technologies such as PostgreSQL, Node, React, and Redux.

work.title: Tech Analyst II
work.description: Supported 300 bed hospital network infrastructure. Assisted in Systems Administrator duties, as well as day to day problems with managing 1000+ devices (desktops, laptops, cell phones, and other proprietary hospital devices).

work.title: Radio Frequency Transmissions Specialist (3D1X3)
work.description: Established sattelite locations, long range antennas, and land mobile radios, as a Ground Control Station (GCS) maintenance technician for the Remotely Piloted Aircrafts/Unmanned Aerial Vehicles.

work.title: Network Administrator
work.description: Worked as a Network Administrator, overseeing a variety of day to day operations including Cisco and Dell Network configuration, Firewall Rules, Windows support and Help Desk, Hardware Repair, Cisco and Panasonic PBX Phone Configuration

work.title: Owner and web designer
work.description: Operated as a sole proprietorhip building websites, repairing computers, setting up home and office networks, and offering technical assistance with anything the customer needed.

work.title: A/V Technician - Network and Phones specialist
work.description: Contract work for building fully integrated smart homes in the Roaring Fork Valley. Setup networks, phones and home automation consoles.

work.title: Network Technician
work.description: Worked as a network technician setting up and troubleshooting networks to connect early smart home IoT devices such as lighting, media servers, video paging, security cameras and computers.

work.title: Computer Repair Tech
work.description: Computer repair technician for a small 4 person shop. I performed antivirus/spyware removal, and hardware repairs and upgrades for client's computers. I also designed and setup the company's website in PHP and HTML. Wrote a script to enable easier remote troubleshooting of computers with VNC, using VBS.

work.title: Computer Repair Tech
work.description: Refurbished older donated computers to be upcycled to low income families. Tested the hardware components of donated computers, cannabalizing parts from broken devices, and re-assembling into the best version we could. Created process for testing, formatting and reimaging computers with Windows 2k for entire shop.

work.title: Intern Networking/ISP support
work.description: First job in the Tech field, setup some long range wideband antennas, learned the basics of the OSI Model, Troubleshooting, Network configuration and how to ask a LOT of questions.

projects.title: Palette Picker
projects.category: App to create a comlimentary color scheme and save to a database.

projects.title: NASA Pic of the day
projects.category: A simple site built with Vue for a challenge to learn and deploy a site in a new framework in a weekend.

projects.title: Compass Job Search
projects.category: Job search app for people who are considering different locations and gives detailed city info for that job.

projects.title: Light Side
projects.category: A Star Wars fan site where you can cross refernce all canon Star Wars data, save favorites and learn more about the star wars universe.
